channel.title: [317] Noclip command doesnt work

item.title: [317] Noclip command doesnt work
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

maybe you can search since it’s been posted million times?

Lol…kidding… here:

if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) {
        for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) {
                for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) {
                        for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
                        aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

                }
        }      
}

needs to be put in method73 in client.java (client side)

then server side client.java is your next part

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 2){ disconnected = true; }

that should do.

what i’ve done on my server (just for teh lulz) is changed the command ::noclip into a different word completely (::randomshit) because you’ll always get fags trying to dc themself on purpose trying to new find ways to dupe and abuse
